verbs.description: assault case against conboy [V: dismissed] refused to appear at the first day of his trial if you are not out tonight with all of your expletive i will call the albany police department and say that you beat me and get an order of protection against you kelly conboy 33 can be heard saying on an april 2011 recording obtained by the times union william conboy 35 a former assistant district attorney most recently under district attorney david soares was charged with attacking his wife at 1 30 a m on jan 30 2011 inside the couple home on meadow lane kelly conboy alleged her husband kicked and choked her and pushed her to the ground kicking her in the throat with a rubber - soled boot and dragging the boot from her throat to her chest according to court papers filed in city court the reason she elected not to testify against mr conboy is that would only serve to make her strained relationship with mr conboy even worse and this would have a negative impact on their young daughter later that day records show she emailed assistant district attorney shannon sarfoh the lead sex crimes prosecutor in albany county attorney michael mansion became the special prosecutor because soares office had a conflict due to william conboy being a former employee david soares william conboy iii michael mansion albany county new york kelly conboy neil breslin cheryl coleman william conboy assault albany new york conboy
